x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: A dedicated tool would allow nonprofits to track their sustainability efforts (energy usage, waste reduction, etc.) in real-time, improving transparency and supporting environmental accountability.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many nonprofit organizations have sustainability goals, but tracking and reporting progress can be complex, especially without a structured system in place.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The tool would integrate with ServiceNow’s asset and facilities management features to track energy consumption, waste, and other sustainability metrics. Nonprofits would be able to generate reports for stakeholders, donors, and regulatory bodies.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with IoT devices for real-time data collection and reporting.
  • Asset Management
  • Reporting & Dashboard

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Implementing IoT sensors and ensuring data accuracy, as well as managing integration across different facilities and tracking various sustainability metrics.
